showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was clean with lots of hot water and decent water pressure. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ flying j over 15 yrs now never a problem until here at this location today. Occasionally I still take a load so I stopped here briefly to fuel and take a shower. I went inside directly to the shower not into the store,when I came out of ‚Ä¶

I am professional and fueled at this location,  decided to use a shower and arrived at 19:00 hour waited for a shower to become available.  There were 7 showers at this location not clean and I asked when these showers will become available ‚Ä¶

Very dirty laundry room area. Trash everywhere employees standing around and not doing anything but gossip. At least this place has ample parking. Going to get a shower but I‚Äôm not expecting it to be clean.
Even pulling in at 1800 there was plenty of parking. The shower was pretty nice as well.

‚Ä¶ best flying J in Indiana that I‚Äôve been to so far I have fresh cappuccino fresh salads a good breakfast and a hot shower and most important I took my dog Bella out in this huge cornfield behind there and she took me for a walk every ‚Ä¶

Stayed here last night was able to get a parking spot with no problem. But in the morning I was expecting to get a nice clean shower. I waited at least an hour for my turn in to the shower before I asked the guy up front if there was ‚Ä¶

I am a female passenger to a trucker so we take team showers.  Great water pressure if water is turned all way on but water wasn't super hot but I was comfortable.  Shower 12 door handle is broke so door didn't shut properly and no occupied ‚Ä¶

This place truly doesn't even deserve a star. I came to unwind and take a nice hot shower and this is what I walk into. After walking into this I felt dirtier than I did when I went in to shower. This needs to be handled this can't be ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Brittany is super friendly and helpful! My son and I had to walk over here to shower because Flying J is under construction still, and she was just so nice! Very cool inside, too!
Went in for a shower at 230 pm and was told there were no clean showers and there wouldn't be for an extended period of time because there were no maintenance guys working. ‚Ä¶

Thought it was a awesome little truck stop. We came in for a shower everything was super clean, the young lady behind the counter was really nice let us bobtail over to Walmart for supplies for the next few weeks, loved how the parking lot ‚Ä¶

First appearance the cops where out front. I walked in and waited 10 minutes for a shower. I seen three out of the five employees standing around watching us wait. I received the shower that I asked for. But once in side I noticed that ‚Ä¶
Stopped for fuel n shower shower was nice n hot freindly staff nice cashier they also had anti fuel gel on sale will stop back when in area
Good and clean place. Price for shower is cheap. I like this truck stop.
Great place to stop and grab some fuel in the shower in and out
Nice place shower $5

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ fuel lines to be reorganised! No much food available, restaurant was closed at 8pm, not sure when did it close. Shower was one of the worst I ever had, to small and no much room to put your bag around. It was so cold and addition ‚Ä¶
This Petro caters to the drivers of America.. the showers here actually have the a/c running. You don't come out sweaty from getting a shower. ‚Ä¶

Absolutely worst petro I have ever been to went to take a shower and think cockroach treated me y‚Äôall need to do better I showed the cashier lady the video and she laughed and said what you never seen a cockroach before that‚Äôs crazy ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to park here when every other stop around here was full. Yes, I had to pay for it, but my company reimburses me. Parking, fuel, food, and a shower. What more do you want? All the crybabies must expect the Beverly Hilton or something. Get ‚Ä¶

It's easy to get into the parking spaces, but why so many reserved spots? The showers are pretty good. The shower rooms have a hair dryer, an extra towel along with a hand towel, a mini bar of soap, a plastic cup and even a mint. Only thing ‚Ä¶

Tina at the fuel desk says I don't have to let you get a shower even though you bought fuel because you don't have a rewards card. I say I don't use one enough to want one, thank you. I would just like a shower. She all but threw me out of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ she will be happy to oblige. Store was clean well stocked, didn‚Äôt eat at the restaurant so can‚Äôt comment on it.  Shower was clean, although the room was small and not much room to move around in. Quite a few parking places and plenty ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ fuel there cause it was the closest truck stop. I was almost empty. So go and park and come in to take a shower . That's when the casher tells me my fuel ticket wouldn't get me a shower. I explained to her I just bought 300 dollars of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ any of my ‚Äúoff duty‚Äù hours?   Oh, and thanks a lot TA / Petro for shutting off my rewards card and taking away all of my points. I was hoping to use the them for a shower last night. You are trying way too hard to lose us as customers.

‚Ä¶ due to company policies, but at times we must use TA/Petro for our amenities of food, restrooms, parking, laundry, and showers so we know the policy for team showers although we rarely have any available on our card, as long as you are a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I didn't see any bulk def. The showers looked like they used to be nice. Shower one had gross looking grout in the tile. Especially around the toilet. And the shower head is junk too. The employees were very nice. The breakfast burritos ‚Ä¶

As you need 75 gallons of diesel for free shower, i was able to make only 52  gallons..my tanks already got full...there was no shower on my Ambest card. Counter girl Jasica gave me favor and only charged me .75 cents instead of $ 10 for ‚Ä¶

The bidet was a surprise. Never seen one of these in a truck stop shower room. Looks like the place was in the process of being remodel. They do have a Arby's and other convenience store items. There is a repair shop for trucks also. The ‚Ä¶

Shower was COLD. Cashiers told me my fleet card was ok,  then changed their mind. Then charged me credit price after telling me debit card was good for cash price. Overall one of the worst Ambest places I've ever been to.
Diesel price was good but they're hot water than work for the showers I guess you have to give one for the other if you want cheap fuel price diesel for trucking you must give up shower
‚Ä¶ Took shower here today.....ONLY GOT 1 TOWEL.....hope you can see in the dark if you shave... ‚Ä¶
If you're going to take a shower here, bring your own towel and soap. If you find soap in shower, it may not be theirs.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be
